Token.Abstract: This category adds methods to the UIKit framework's UIButton class. The methods in this category provide support for loading remote images and background images asynchronously from a URL.
Set the shared image downloader used to download images.

Parameter.Name: imageDownloader
Parameter.Abstract: The shared image downloader used to download images.

Token.Abstract: The shared image downloader used to download images.
Asynchronously downloads an image from the specified URL, and sets it as the image for the specified state once the request is finished. Any previous image request for the receiver will be cancelled.

Parameter.Name: state
Parameter.Abstract: The control state.

Parameter.Name: url
Parameter.Abstract: The URL used for the image request.

Token.Abstract: Asynchronously downloads an image from the specified URL, and sets it as the image for the specified state once the request is finished. Any previous image request for the receiver will be cancelled.

Parameter.Name: state
Parameter.Abstract: The control state.

Parameter.Name: url
Parameter.Abstract: The URL used for the image request.

Parameter.Name: placeholderImage
Parameter.Abstract: The image to be set initially, until the image request finishes. If nil, the button will not change its image until the image request finishes.

Token.Abstract: Asynchronously downloads an image from the specified URL request, and sets it as the image for the specified state once the request is finished. Any previous image request for the receiver will be cancelled.
Token.Declaration: - (void)setImageForState:(UIControlState)state withURLRequest:(NSURLRequest *)urlRequest placeholderImage:(nullable UIImage *)placeholderImage success:(nullable void ( ^ ) ( NSURLRequest *request , NSHTTPURLResponse *_Nullable response , UIImage *image ))success failure:(nullable void ( ^ ) ( NSURLRequest *request , NSHTTPURLResponse *_Nullable response , NSError *error ))failure

Parameter.Name: state
Parameter.Abstract: The control state.

Parameter.Name: urlRequest
Parameter.Abstract: The URL request used for the image request.

Parameter.Name: placeholderImage
Parameter.Abstract: The image to be set initially, until the image request finishes. If nil, the button will not change its image until the image request finishes.

Parameter.Name: success
Parameter.Abstract: A block to be executed when the image data task finishes successfully. This block has no return value and takes three arguments: the request sent from the client, the response received from the server, and the image created from the response data of request. If the image was returned from cache, the response parameter will be nil.

Parameter.Name: failure
Parameter.Abstract: A block object to be executed when the image data task finishes unsuccessfully, or that finishes successfully. This block has no return value and takes three arguments: the request sent from the client, the response received from the server, and the error object describing the network or parsing error that occurred.

Token.Abstract: Asynchronously downloads an image from the specified URL, and sets it as the background image for the specified state once the request is finished. Any previous background image request for the receiver will be cancelled.

Parameter.Name: state
Parameter.Abstract: The control state.

Parameter.Name: url
Parameter.Abstract: The URL used for the background image request.

Token.Abstract: Asynchronously downloads an image from the specified URL, and sets it as the background image for the specified state once the request is finished. Any previous image request for the receiver will be cancelled.

Parameter.Name: state
Parameter.Abstract: The control state.

Parameter.Name: url
Parameter.Abstract: The URL used for the background image request.

Parameter.Name: placeholderImage
Parameter.Abstract: The background image to be set initially, until the background image request finishes. If nil, the button will not change its background image until the background image request finishes.

Token.Abstract: Asynchronously downloads an image from the specified URL request, and sets it as the image for the specified state once the request is finished. Any previous image request for the receiver will be cancelled.
Token.Declaration: - (void)setBackgroundImageForState:(UIControlState)state withURLRequest:(NSURLRequest *)urlRequest placeholderImage:(nullable UIImage *)placeholderImage success:(nullable void ( ^ ) ( NSURLRequest *request , NSHTTPURLResponse *_Nullable response , UIImage *image ))success failure:(nullable void ( ^ ) ( NSURLRequest *request , NSHTTPURLResponse *_Nullable response , NSError *error ))failure

Parameter.Name: state
Parameter.Abstract: The control state.

Parameter.Name: urlRequest
Parameter.Abstract: The URL request used for the image request.

Parameter.Name: placeholderImage
Parameter.Abstract: The background image to be set initially, until the background image request finishes. If nil, the button will not change its background image until the background image request finishes.

Parameter.Name: success
Parameter.Abstract: A block to be executed when the image data task finishes successfully. This block has no return value and takes three arguments: the request sent from the client, the response received from the server, and the image created from the response data of request. If the image was returned from cache, the response parameter will be nil.

Parameter.Name: failure
Parameter.Abstract: A block object to be executed when the image data task finishes unsuccessfully, or that finishes successfully. This block has no return value and takes three arguments: the request sent from the client, the response received from the server, and the error object describing the network or parsing error that occurred.

Token.Abstract: Cancels any executing image task for the specified control state of the receiver, if one exists.

Parameter.Name: state
Parameter.Abstract: The control state.

Token.Abstract: Cancels any executing background image task for the specified control state of the receiver, if one exists.

Parameter.Name: state
Parameter.Abstract: The control state.
